dcterms:creator: J. R. Kwapisz
G. M. Weiss
S. A. Moore
dcterms:description: The WISDM dataset is a public benchmark HAR dataset provided by the Wireless Sensor Data Mining (WISDM) Lab, which contains 6 data attributes: user, activity, timestamp, x-acceleration, y-acceleration, z-acceleration. 29 volunteer participants were enlisted to perform a specific set of activities using an Android smartphone.
dcterms:title: WISDM dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Reiss
D. Stricker
dcterms:description: The PAMAP2 Physical Activity Monitoring dataset contains 18 different physical activities collected from 9 subjects who wore 3 wireless Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs). The dataset includes accelerometer, gyroscope, magnetometer, and heart rate data.
dcterms:title: PAMAP2 dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Micucci
M. Mobilio
P. Napoletano
dcterms:description: UniMiB SHAR is a smartphone accelerometer dataset designed for benchmarking various classification tasks related to human activity recognition, including fall detection and activities of daily living.
dcterms:title: UNIMIB SHAR dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Chavarriaga
H. Sagha
A. Calatroni
S. T. Digumarti
G. Tröster
J. d. R. Millán
D. Roggen
dcterms:description: The OPPORTUNITY dataset records realistic daily life activities of subjects in a sensor-rich environment, integrating multiple sensor systems to capture various activities.
dcterms:title: OPPORTUNITY dataset

dcterms:description: The weakly labeled dataset was collected using a triaxial acceleration sensor embedded in an iPhone 7, containing five kinds of activities performed by participants.
dcterms:title: Weakly Labeled dataset
